title: Help
description: ***Please report any platform-related issues in the comment section below.*** ### Contributing To add or update a project page, you will need to [sign-up](signup) on the platform. We use your email to authenticate and don't ask/track any private information. Once signed up, I will grant you the permissions to add/edit data here. ### Text Editor This page highlights some helpful features of the text editor on this site. These are available to you when adding comments, creating pages - any place you need to add text. The editor interprets the text as markdown. See this cheatsheet for some commonly used markdown syntax. #### Latex In addition to standard markdown, you can also use $\LaTeX$ anywhere in the text by enclosing it in '$' symbol. See example below: ``` The Euler's equation is the identity $$e^{i \pi} + 1 = 0$$ where $e$ is the Euler's number and $i$ is the imaginary unit. ``` renders like so: > The Euler's equation is the identity $$e^{i \pi} + 1 = 0$$ where $e$ is the Euler's number and $i$ is the imaginary unit #### Smart links Sophize also allows you to add smart links to various resource in this dataset: | Sample Smart Link | Description | | -- | -- | | `#P_deccl` | Renders as #P_deccl - a link to proposition 'deccl' in `set.mm` | | `#A_deccl` | Renders as #A_deccl - a link to proof of proposition 'deccl' in `set.mm` | | `#metamath/J_automation/proposals` | Renders as #metamath/J_automation/proposals - a link to a page in this project. | | #34 | Link to reference to comment number 34 in this project. |
